info.title: SIMANTIC - Change & Configuration API
info.description: API untuk CMDB, Change Management, Maintenance & Patch Management

get.summary: SSO callback - exchange SSO token for API token
get.description: Mengambil token SSO (query parameter 'token') dan memanggil service SSO untuk mengambil data user. Jika user belum ada, sistem membuat user baru dan mengembalikan token Sanctum.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token SSO yang diterima dari provider SSO

400.description: Bad Request: token tidak disediakan atau request SSO bermasalah

post.description: Endpoint untuk testing SSO callback yang return JSON (tidak redirect). Berguna untuk testing API integration.

400.description: Token tidak ditemukan atau data tidak lengkap

message.example: Terjadi kesalahan saat memproses login SSO

get.description: SSO portal redirects user here with token, then redirect to frontend app

parameters.name: redirect
parameters.description: Frontend path to redirect after login

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of Request for Change (RFC) records with optional status filtering

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by RFC status. Use 'null' to get RFCs with null status

get.description: Retrieve a single Request for Change (RFC) record by its ID

post.description: Create or update an RFC approval entry for a given RFC and level. If an approval for the same rfc_id, level, and approver_id exists, it will be updated.

level.description: Approval level (e.g., kepala_kasi, kepala_bidang, kepala_dinas, admin_kota, admin_dinas)

decision.description: Approval decision (approve, reject, need_info, forward, or null for pending)

post.description: Approve an RFC approval entry by its ID. Sets decision to 'approve', updates reason and approved_at.

post.summary: Request more info for RFC Approval by ID
post.description: Set decision to 'need_info' for an RFC approval entry by its ID. Updates reason and approved_at.

get.summary: Get RFC Approval detail by ID
get.description: Retrieve a single RFC Approval record by its ID, including related RFC data.

post.description:
Login menggunakan email dan password untuk mendapatkan Bearer token (Sanctum). 
 *         Token ini digunakan untuk mengakses endpoint API lain yang membutuhkan autentikasi.

200.description: Login sukses. Token Bearer dan data user dikembalikan.

token.description: Token autentikasi Bearer untuk digunakan pada header Authorization

401.description: Kredensial salah (email atau password tidak valid)

422.description: Validasi input gagal (email atau password kosong)

tags.name: Auth
tags.description: Endpoints untuk autentikasi, SSO dan token
